Instruction: Peel the carrots and cut them into sticks or rounds.
In a skillet, combine the orange juice, butter, brown sugar, salt, and black pepper.
Bring the mixture to a simmer over medium heat, stirring occasionally, until the sugar is dissolved.
Add the carrots to the skillet and toss to coat them in the glaze.
Cover the skillet and cook for 8-10 minutes, or until the carrots are tender.
Remove the lid and continue to cook for another 2-3 minutes, or until the glaze thickens.
Serve the orange glazed carrots hot as a sweet and savory side dish.
